website_summaries.verdict: Dons a refreshed, super-sleek design. It’s rechargeable and sturdy with improved features when compared to similar models, so it’s priced a little higher than others.
pros: Consistent compatibility across the board (PPT, Excel, Google Slides, iWork, Keynote, Prezi), so it’s ideal for people who regularly present on different devices
Battery-powered, but is also rechargeable and comes with its own cord
Control range up to 300 ft. and laser range to 656 ft
cons: Has a pen-like design with clip feature that can slip easily out of a pocket or get lost in a large bag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teaching & presenting
customer_reviews.text: I teach at Boston's Northeastern University and have long wanted a tool like this to enhance my classes. It charges via USB and then works with your computer to advance or rewind PowerPoint or Google doc slides. Better yet, it has a laser pointer to highlight topics (or tease your cats) and an audio volume control. The sachet for protecting it in your bag is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Faculty Likes Them
customer_reviews.text: My faculty usage of products determine its quality, reliability. These work very well with presentations, and are slimmer than the logitech brand that we purchased in the past, which the faculty seem to like, as it's easy to carry around. Laser is nice and bright, easy to see, and the controls are simple, and uncluttered. The Logitech presenters were very good also, just a different design, but we noticed as the presenters aged, the surface got sticky. The DinoFire gets a five-star rating as it's still brand new.
customer_reviews.author: HigherEd

customer_reviews.title: Long Range
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to have someone else change the powerpoint slideshow for church services and this works great. We have a computer attached to a projector at the front and no easy way for someone else to change the screen slides. I tested the distance by walking outside to the end of my driveway to see if i could change the screen on my computer inside the house and it worked. I have yet to test the range in my church but i know this will give me the freedom to have someone else control the screen during the service while they are sitting in a pew.
customer_reviews.author: figmentty

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't had to charge this and I've had it and been using it for months now! I love the green laser will show up on the vast majority of TV screens that lasers don't tend to show up on which is super useful. Very reasonable price for the quality of this item. I love the travel case/bag it comes in and it's so slim you can slip it in your pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Genetics

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, the customer service is AMAZING, I purchased one and had factory defect. even i failed to return the unit since I am living outside US, she has refunded me the money, and I purchased a second one and works great. for sure will buy again from this brand / supplier. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Arash Maher

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this presentation controller. It is very sturdy for the price point and also has an amazing battery life. The included laser is very bright and easy to use. The controller charges quickly and is ready for another use in a short amount of time. I love mine and use it everyday without any issues. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Slim and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this pointer because I am a travelling trainer and I needed a smaller pointer that I could travel with. I also chose this one because it has a green laser which is easier to see than red ones. This pointer is super easy to set up and use. I have no complaints with this.
customer_reviews.author: Snowmanmo

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price - Consistent connection issues
customer_reviews.text: This remote is decent for what it costs. I have never made it through an entire presentation without it losing connection at least once. I don't know if it's something I am doing, but no matter where I use it or on what system, it seems to drop connection. I have to unplug the dongle, and plug it back in to get it to re-connect. The features are great, the laser is bright enough, just has connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: TinyRhino

customer_reviews.title: what I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, laser is strong - sleek and well packaged. Am please to say it is what I wanted and expected. Did not try the remote control option... I was after the strong laser aspect and sleek look-and-feel. May have to try remote control someday
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: worked great at first...
customer_reviews.text: If you need to turn the presenter off and on several times during your presentation, this may NOT be the best presenter for you. At first this presenter worked great and I had no issues when I had to turn it off and then on after 3 minutes or so. Now when I turn it off and then on again, it may not come back on for 2 minutes or longer. I keep the presenter charged and am only using it twice a week. I will definitely be looking for a different presenter. (I've been using bluetooth and RF presenters for 13 years and this is the first time I've had this kind of issue)
customer_reviews.author: Cmazon Austomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, plug n play. Seemed to functioned form around the presentation room that I was using. Small - light weight. The pointer /laser is a nice bonus and proved itself very handy during the presentation. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ptf

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: Great laser pointer , light and relatively easy to use
customer_reviews.author: H. Badillo

customer_reviews.title: Don't look at it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she could do more effective presentations at work. It was easy to set up, and very bright and focused. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many, pointers/clickers. For my hubby, this is hands down his favorite. Slim and comfortable to hold, that he can put it in his shirt pocket is great. Thank you, for the wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: Possible eye damage
customer_reviews.text: Nice, very light weight product; works well, but I assume this is a Class IIIa laser pointer (<5mW). If so, it should have a laser warning label on it per Code of Federal Regulation (21 CFR 1040.10), as it can cause eye damage. There was no laser label, or mention of laser danger on the packaging or included documentation. One should be aware of eye damage that can occur from operating the laser, and should not leave it laying around for kids to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Mac's view

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with first one I bought. The usb was broken. I contacted Dino was cool of them to send me another one. Saved the day ! Good product I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aceontheriver

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Performed perfectly for a session with 8 15 minute presentations in a row!
customer_reviews.author: G82G

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this product and the green laser pointer, however it would not connect to my MacBook Pro bluetooth function. I read and re-read the instructions (which were not that extensive) to see if I had missed a pairing function but I didn't see it. I had to order a USB C to USB adapter. For the price point it should be able to be recognized by all platforms.
customer_reviews.author: GODBLESSTEXAS2005

customer_reviews.title: Best pointer ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used many pointers but this is the best pointer ever. It is better than L*** pointers. Very easy to use, nice strong green light. The batter inside is rechargeable. The build quality is slightly less than L***, but great price and great functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non responsive
customer_reviews.text: Within less than 3 weeks of use, now the laser button doesn't respond as expected. I have to click many times to get the laser beam. So frustrating. Last Sunday it suddenly dimmed the laser beam and it got hot as I was using it.. then in few minutes it went bak to normal again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raafat Baheeg

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Green Laser Light, Useless on Video Screens!!!
customer_reviews.text: Green laser light seemed like something cool and different but it disappears on video screens, which all conference rooms use these days. It was an embarrassing discovery at a client site and pretty ridiculous for a product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: USB dongle would not fit any USB port I had - very poorly made
customer_reviews.author: David Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Always losing charge
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this very often, but when I do it seems to take longer to charge than I would have even needed it. laser is nice and the buttons are fairly responsive, but it just won't hold a charge the way I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: full function presenter but USB connector is not easy to plug in-and-out
customer_reviews.text: I choose this product item because it has everything I need - USB recharge, light weight, and the greenlight is bright enough to spot in LED monitor. But yesterday when I used it in an important presentation the USB connector is not able to plug in my laptop's USB connector (which scared me a lot LOL). Without any other choice the only thing I can do is hard pushing, then I realized it's just too TIGHT to plug in, you just need strong push to make connector fit in (and do the same thing again but in another direction after presentation)
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Tzuan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Features But...
customer_reviews.text: The device arrived working, connected to my MacBook, but the laser pointer has some diffraction going on creating rings and fringes. Returning for replacement, we will see how the new one fairs. Update: Received new item that has a non-functioning power switch. Returned item and purchased another brand device.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: You have to charge it, does not take batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This pointer is rechargable, no batteries. Which sounds great, but I keep forgetting to turn off the little power switch so I constantly run it down and have to recharge it. (I'm a professor and I used it all day every day)
customer_reviews.author: R.A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Charge Frequently!
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, had to charge nightly to get an hours use presenting daily. Battery operated laser pointers have lasted longer for me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Watt

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star product for me.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars except for one thing. The forward/reverse design is wrong. While holding presenter the natural tendency to advance the slide actually reverses it. So I found myself frequently having to correct my slides during a presentation. I finally made a conscious effort to think before activating direction. Which should not be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Green laser is nice and bright. Does not work on LCD TVs, laser just reflects off and is not visible on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This thing does not work
customer_reviews.text: Don't Bother. Product arrived without dongle and wont charge. I plugged it in to my computer and their was no auto pop up software. I was taken. Of course I threw away the packaging so I can return it. what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: A. Key

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bad battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Lousy battery life. Green laser pointer only lasts about 3-5 minutes and then has to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Can't figure out how to use this
customer_reviews.text: Even got some other folks from the office to try and it just won't connect to my laptop's presentation
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Never worked and can't get company to respond when I file for a return
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Green light absorbs into the screen!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK ON SCREENS or monitors - the green light absorbs into the monitor. Did not work for power points that were on a big screen when I needed this for a presentation!
customer_reviews.author: sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my MAC, and it's awesome. I keep dropping it though, but only because there is something wrong with me and I can't stop moving around when I teach.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peitsinovski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Range of signal and easy to use. Laser is bright. And the recharging of battery
customer_reviews.author: andrewzindar

customer_reviews.title: Laser stopped working after first use
customer_reviews.text: I am really unhappy with this clicker/pointer. The laser stopped working after first use and I cannot getting working again. I’m trying to figure out how to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from seller.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my pointer on a carpeted floor from waist high two years after purchasing and the laser became detached from the mount inside. I notified the seller and they replaced the laser pointer no questions asked. Great customer service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and used it a handful of times. When it worked, it worked great. Unfortunately, it stopped working, did not hold a charge. When I called the company they instantly sent out a new one with no problems. I have yet to use the new one as I have not had any seminars lined up. My five star is based on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful tool to go with presentation
customer_reviews.text: Nice to go with PPT application. One suggestion: The manual comes with the product, DinoFire really needs to revise it for a better detail. Or a URL link included will be helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: M from SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: I like the presenter and it is light. The only issue is that to advance a slide in the PPT you must click down arrow instead of up arrow. I found myself hitting the wrong direction several times. Could be I was used to the old device buttons.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to get used to the button layout... not intuitive for me at least...
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and set up. However, the laser pointer button is not working properly and often turns off during use. Update: I raised the star rating to 4 for their great customer service. They sent me a replacement and it’s working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Landry

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my presentation. No install required worked well
customer_reviews.author: Megs513

customer_reviews.title: Fired up then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After two clicks the pointer stops working. Could not get it to run through a power point twice in a row. The laser pointer is the only thing that works consistently.
customer_reviews.author: hal

customer_reviews.title: Pointer, Slide Changer and Volume Control in One
customer_reviews.text: Having a pointer that also changes slides and controls the volume is the key for me. Well designed and produced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need!  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product performs as described! I was a little skeptical about the distance, but I gave it a chance. I had a presentation in a large auditorium and it performed perfectly! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Fulfill Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with the laser light
customer_reviews.text: Update: I got a replacement item from the seller and they shipped it all the way to the Philippines! Good customer service! So I’m updating my stars. I used it once but when I used it again, the “dot” green light became like that in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann D. Maluenda

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service- responsive and polite
customer_reviews.text: My DinoFire only lasted 3 days before the laser pointer was too weak to project and the slides didn’t advance... customer service was fast and a replacement is on its way. Keeping my fingers crossed on my new one because I use it everyday in my class!
customer_reviews.author: Noyd

customer_reviews.title: Not as good at a distance 100’+
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for long distance us 100 to 200 feet. It has yet to reliably work at that distance.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, someone stole my first one and I had to replace, but I love it! Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T. Farley

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought the rechargeable one
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly, convenient, and reliable. I really appreciate the fact that it’s rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: The presenter does not project a dot on the wall, but a blurred figure
customer_reviews.text: The presenterdoes not have any external damage, but does not project a dot, which is what I need for my presentation. What should I do'
customer_reviews.author: Alex Steinhaus

customer_reviews.title: Need to have.
customer_reviews.text: Have used presenters for years. This is the best one I’ve had for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Glasser III

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: First of all, is this laser pointer, right? But it does not blight!!! Even if I fully charged a battery....... Mine was out of order product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: The performance is uneven. Usb doesn’t pick up the signal consistently. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Batgirl8999

customer_reviews.title: Ease of moving slides
customer_reviews.text: This item is used for presenting to clients at my a Seminars; love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second remote. My first one lasted for years! I travel a lot for business and use this 20 weeks out of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Awsome pointer for presentations. Very happy and fast delievery. Better than the red pointers.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Does not work
customer_reviews.text: No stars. This product never charged and no longer works because it cannot hold a charge. It also cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. DeChance

product_meta.title: DinoFire Wireless Presenter Rechargeable Green Light Hyperlink Volume Control USB Presentation Powerpoint Clicker Remote Control Slide Advancer 2.4GHz
feature_bullets: Presentation remote support Hyperlinks, Volume Control, Black Screen, Full Screen, Switching Windows, Page up/down; Plug & Play, no hassle to install driver
Rechargeable Presentation Clicker: With built-in 360mAh rechargeable lithium battery, charging time is about one hour, can use for more than one week

Long control range is up to 300ft ; Bright green light that is easy to see against most background(not recommended for LED, LCD screens); Auto sleep function to save power & Low power indicating function; With a portable pouch
Presenter remote widely supports PowerPoint, MS Word, Excel, Google Slides, ACD See, Website, iWork (Keynote & Numbers & Pages), Prezi etc.
Presentation remote control support systems: Windows 2003, XP, Windows Vista, Windows7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Linux, Android, Mac OS (Only support Page up/ down on Mac)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
